replies.txt_content: 沙发！！

replies.author: rickky2
replies.txt_content:
安装:
1.安装 ModLoader(第一件必须做的事情)
2.解压缩文件夹"classes"到你的minecraft.jar
3.删除minecraft.jar中的META-INF

replies.author: rickky2
replies.txt_content:
420952996 发表于 2011-10-3 10:01 
我这么做了可是黑屏了
有安装zombe mod 吗

-----Some notes about installation-----
1) Make sure you install ModLoader first 
2) Then install this mod by copying the files from "classes" into the minecraft.jar

For Zombe's mods:
1) If you plan to use Zombe's mods, istall them now
2) Then drop the files from the "Zombe Merged Classes" folder in the .zip into your minecraft.jar
3) If you aren't using Zombe's mods, do NOT do anything with those merged class files!

For Risugami's Elemental Arrows Mod:
1) If you plan to use the Elemental Arrows mod, istall it now
2) Then drop the file from the "Element Arrows Merged Class" folder in the .zip into your minecraft.jar
3) If you aren't using the Elemental Arrows mod, do NOT do anything with that merged class file!

-----安装-----
1）第一，确保你安装modloader
2）安装此插件就是复制文件到minecraft.jar

为zombe的模型
1）如果您要安装zombe的插件，现在安装安装
2）然后把.zip里面的文件夹中的文件复制到你的minecraft.jar
3）如果你不使用zombe的插件，不做任何事情

为risugami的元素箭模型
1）如果您计划使用元素箭mod，现在安装
2）将.zip里面的文件放到minecraft.jar里
3）如果你不使用元素箭，不做任何事情

好吧，这就是我的翻译~
